details:
Lenka (37mins) 

Do not adjust your screens, clearly this girl has been tanning on the surface of the sun. I love how unpredictable my little scam is, most of the time I have no idea what the girl is going to be like. It's lucky I'm a dirty bastard as some of the wannabe models that knock on my door are not what you would call marriage material. Take this girl for example, even her sun-bed addiction and more tattoo’s than a jailbird with 3 life sentences didn't put me off. I'd only spoken to her on the phone previously and had requested some pics but she told me her internet had been cut off and she couldn't afford to pay the bill until she found some work.  All I could think about was fucking  her just to prove to myself that I've simply got no standards. And that is clearly still the case. There certainly wasn't much warmth in this casting, just cold hard fucking. She swallowed my cum like it was apple juice, which I have been drinking a lot of lately. She'll have to look elsewhere if she wants to pay that bill.
